Fear swoops into a small village where the Bat Without Wings, a notorious villain, has returned after a five year absence. Now a prominent young maiden has disappeared into his clutches, and it's up to her family and a resourceful swordsman to tangle with ghosts, a bamboo labyrinth, and crafty bat traps to stop this winged menace!
 From the director of The Magic Blade and The Lizard, this outlandish, action-packed martial arts cult classic now comes to DVD for the first time in America, fully restored and flying high!
